ai-tha-ap221:1.3_0: having seen the ascetic had answered:
ai-tha-ap221:2.2_0: to the branch of the gods.
ai-tha-ap221:2.3_0: When a gift is given to me,
ai-tha-ap221:3.2_0: With the ending of defilements, the defilements.
ai-tha-ap221:3.3_0: I paid homage at the teacher’s feet,
ai-tha-ap221:3.4_0: at the end of the spiritual life,
ai-tha-ap221:4.3_0: The wise one would not darkness
ai-tha-ap221:5.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap221:5.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap221:5.4_0: as is the fruit of ghee.
ai-tha-ap221:6.1_0: in this place wherever seven eons
ai-tha-ap221:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pañcasikha.
ai-tha-ap221:9.1_0: is the ninth Elder Nun Similar,
